name: Quarantine: Isolation
description:
A first person puzzle game of a guy slowly going insane in his small apartment during a fictional pandemic. The goal of each level or “day” is to find  the bottle of antivirus pills he keeps leaving around the apartment in his bouts of insanity. Every “day” in this guy's life the items in the apartment change and it gets steadily more messy and shows his descent into insanity. Throughout the game the player will uncover the mystery of his insanity and experience the descent of society outside.

*This game is a work in progress*
